snippet: Stephanie Hill Wilchfort, who has been vice president of development at the Lower East Side Tenement Museum, is to be named president and chief executive of the Brooklyn Children’s Museum in Crown Heights.
abstract: Stephanie Hill Wilchfort, who has been vice president of development at the Lower East Side Tenement Museum, is to be named president and chief executive of the Brooklyn Children’s Museum in Crown Heights.

headline.main: A New Leader for Brooklyn Children's Museum
headline.print_headline: Children’s Museum Has a New Leader
